title: Analyze On-Time Performance
description: A manager wants to review the on-time performance (OTP) for a specific bus route from the previous month.

tasks.description: Generate the on-time performance report for the selected route and date range.
The report shows the percentage of trips that were 'on time' (e.g., between 1 minute early and 5 minutes late).
tasks.expected_outcome: The overall OTP for the route is displayed as 88%.

tasks.description: Identify the specific time points or stops along the route with the highest number of delays.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows most delays occur in the downtown segment during the afternoon peak.

tasks.description: Recommend a schedule adjustment for the afternoon trips to add more running time through the downtown segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager proposes a data-driven solution to improve OTP.
